revised_title: Zoological Collections from Kerguelen's Land: Description of a New Species of Ray
tldr: The author describes the zoological collections made in Kerguelen's Land, focusing on a new species of ray, Raja eatonii. The species has distinct features such as smooth upper body surface, a series of spines along the median line of the tail, and brownish-black coloration with indistinct white spots. The author also mentions the presence of a second species, Baja murrayi, found in Kerguelen's Land.
